lilliurlian

Class ShortenerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • lilliurlian.ShortenerService

  • public class ShortenerService
extends java.lang.Object
    Data Access Object. Each method of this class manages a specific write/read need of the server after receiving a client request. MongoDB queries are used after security and consistency checks are executed on input data.
    Author:
    GruppoPBDMNG-14

    • Method Detail

      • createNewUrl

        public UrlFromClient createNewUrl(java.lang.String body)
                           throws CustomUrlExistsException,
                                  WrongUrlException,
                                  CustomUrlNotValidException
        Controls input data from the client, creates a new shortUrl and saves it in the database with its infos.
        Parameters:
        body - Body of the request sent by the client.
        Returns:
        the shortUrl just created with relative infos.
        Throws:
        CustomUrlExistsException
        WrongUrlException
        CustomUrlNotValidException

      • searchShortUrl

        public java.lang.String searchShortUrl(java.lang.String shortUrl,
                                       java.lang.String agentName,
                                       java.lang.String agentOS,
                                       java.lang.String agentIP)
                                throws PageNotFoundException
        Searches if the shortUrl requested for redirect is inside the database. If yes returns the relative longUrl and updates click statistics.
        Parameters:
        shortUrl - The shortUrl requested from the client for redirecting purposes.
        agentName - The name of the browser that made the request.
        agentOS - The name of the Operating System hosting the browser.
        agentIP - The IP of the agent addressing the request.
        Returns:
        the longUrl associated to the shortUrl requested.
        Throws:
        PageNotFoundException

      • getStats

        public UrlFromServer getStats(java.lang.String body)
                       throws PageNotFoundException
        Read the statistics of a given shortUrl.
        Parameters:
        body - Body of the request sent by the client.
        Returns:
        all the infos and stats about the given shortUrl
        Throws:
        PageNotFoundException
